document.full_text: bombardier inc  broke a 16-month order drought for its new cseries jetliner on wednesday, announcing a small 10-plane deal and hinting that more orders may not be far off.
document.title: bombardier says cseries jet talks far along
lines_and_colors: bombardier inc  broke a 16-month order drought for its new cseries jetliner on wednesday, announcing a small 10-plane deal and hinting that more orders may not be far off.
